items.title: 1139KM
items.description: I choose to use the camera to express my own ideas which were not related to personal identy. I have also tried to use the computer to change something which I hope can be different. "Scooters in Taipei" is my first topic, started in 2012 and continuing until this year. During this period, I have also started another project "1139KM", which is about the coastline of Taiwan.
